alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Montgomery, Pike Road, Auburn University In Montgomery, Eastdale Mall, Pinedale, Mount Meigs, Alabama State University, Mitylene and Barachias.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
